remarks: Contraposition law for strict ordering in orthoposets.  ( ~ chpsscon3 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 4-Nov-2011.)
statement:
opltcon3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
opltcon3.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
opltcon3.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
opltcon3b $p |- ( ( K e. OP /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .< Y <-> ( ._|_ ` Y ) .< ( ._|_ ` X ) ) ) $.
